title: Mastering Instructional Design in Social Sciences Using Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, enhancing capacity to develop social sector education programs for working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can design a microlearning course map for social studies using generative AI tools within three days
Learners can derive at least five criteria for evaluating the quality and reliability of AI-generated instructional designs through SWOT analysis
Learners can improve the educational suitability of AI-generated outputs by at least 80% through prompt engineering that reflects domain expertise

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
